projects.title: Light
projects.description: A data-driven, highly-modularized and multi-threaded 3d game engine written in modern C++ that utilizes ECS(Entities, Components & Systems) for modularity & thread safety, Vulkan for rendering and LuaJIT for scripting.

projects.title: BindlessVK
projects.description: A physically based renderer(PBR) written in modern C++ using Vulkan API, it utilizes a bindless design to minimize state changes and decrease cpu workload for performance.

projects.title: Hikari
projects.description: A Raytracer written in rust for the purpose of learning more about ray-tracing and rust, following the great books "Raytracing In One Weekend" and the followup "Raytracing The Next Week" by Peter Shirley
